channel.title: Tag: teensy - blog.lmorchard.com
channel.description: It's all spinning wheels & self-doubt until the first pot of coffee.

item.title: Making of the GameChord
item.description: <html><head></head><body>TL;DR: I made a USB keypad that's good for gaming and typing entirely with one hand.</body></html>

item.title: Building a USB controller for an IBM Model M
item.description: <html><head></head><body>TL;DR: I wired up a Teensy 2.0++ to an IBM Model M keyboard, which gave it a USB interface and custom firmware that can remap keys and do other interesting things.</body></html>

item.title: Keyboard hacking seems like fun
item.description: <html><head></head><body>TL;DR: I think I've caught the DIY keyboard hacking bug, and I'll probably end up building something weird.</body></html>
